text: Roger Hverven (born 15 March 1944) is a retired Norwegian handball ving-player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Oslo and represented the club Oppsal IF. In 1972 he was part of the Norwegian team which finished ninth in the Olympic tournament. He played four matches and scored seven goals. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Norway Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Roger Hverven
